channel.title: Public Offering on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Public Offering on FinanClub

item.title: PR
item.description: score:684 Chances: Announcement of Permian Resources’ second quarter 2023 financial and operational results. Declaration of a quarterly base and variable cash dividend by Permian Resources’ Board of Directors. Notice of Permian Resources’ second quarter 2023 financial and operating results reporting date. Discussion on Permian Resources’ potential earnings beat based on options market movements.

item.title: QS
item.description: score:1010 Chances: Announcement of QuantumScape’s successful closing of an underwritten public offering, raising $300 million. Discussing the decline in QuantumScape’s stock price despite gains in Chinese stocks and reasons behind the drop. Reviewing QuantumScape’s financial position and assessing the risk of running out of money.

item.title: AUR
item.description: score:1093 Chances: Aurora Innovation announced positive First Half 2023 results with a narrowed net loss of US$414.0 million. The company is scheduled to present at the Canaccord Genuity 43rd Annual Growth Conference, indicating efforts to engage with investors. Aurora’s second quarter 2023 results have been released, and its shareholder letter and financial results are available for review on its investor relations website.
